msg.msgText: Discovery time expired. Failed to communicate with the other node in the HA-pair.

msgExplanation.p:
Possible causes include:
The other node of the high availability pair is down.
The nodes are not configured properly.
Network error.

ul.li: Ensure that both nodes of the high availability pair are started and can communicate with each other.
Ensure that the high availability configuration is correct. Both nodes must have the same Group and, if HA NICs are defined, they must have the correct IP addresses.
If the problem is not resolved, try to use manual HA configuration (define LocalDiscoveryNIC, LocalReplicationNIC, and RemoteDiscoveryNIC) to establish the HA-Pair.
